thread.title: BRIEF-Continental Reinsurance Posts Q1 Group Pretax Profit Of 928.8 Mln Naira

title: BRIEF-Continental Reinsurance Posts Q1 Group Pretax Profit Of 928.8 Mln Naira

organizations.name: brief-continental reinsurance posts q1 group pretax
brief-continental reinsurance posts q1 group preta

text:
April 27, 2018 / 8:52 AM / in 29 minutes BRIEF-Continental Reinsurance Posts Q1 Group Pretax Profit Of 928.8 Mln Naira Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
April 27 (Reuters) - Continental Reinsurance PLC :
* Q1 ENDED MARCH GROUP PROFIT BEFORE TAX 928.8 MILLION NAIRA VERSUS 705.7 MILLION NAIRA YEAR AGO
* Q1 GROUP NET INSURANCE PREMIUM REVENUE OF 6.99 BILLION NAIRA VERSUS 5.27 BILLION NAIRA YEAR AGO Source: bit.ly/2Jx7ENE Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
